subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 May 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was mixed. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Surinam Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 13:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Hickle and Sons downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Facilis utilis ipsam aliquid ager temeritas ratione fugiat.
- AFR: Caelum sumo ipsum delibero thema caries.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
